column11: Who’s in the pictures on my walls
column18: 那茉莉混合着夜来香与百合的味道
column20: 或你可笑但可爱的法国口音
column25: The shade of green that if he’d seen
column26: 他或许曾见过的墨绿色
column27: Would make F. Scott Fitzgerald Cry
column28: 会使作家应景而流泪（F. Scott Fitzgerald20世纪美国作家、编剧）
column31: Break down at two AM and call
column32: 凌晨两点崩溃后与你通话
column42: But I only dream about you
column44: Once or twice a night at most
column50: Don’t get distracted by your smile
column51: 不想因为你的笑容而分心
column52: And miss the green lights driving home
column53: 回家路上还总是错过绿灯
column58: But I think our song is coming on
column59: 脑海里有属于我们的歌
column60: And now I wanna crash the car
column61: 现在我只想毁了这辆车
column64: Make that mistake again and fall
column65: 再犯一次错 然后沉沦
